data.actual_result: It redirects to the applications page.
data.expected_result: If you ctrl + click on the link icon, it should open the same page from the section the icon was next to.
data.short_description: Ctrl + clicking on link icons in dev doc pages opens applications page
data.steps_to_repro: - hover your mouse over a subheading, like "Audit logs" - Ctrl + click on the link icon that appears - observe the page that opens in a new tab - NOTE: This works for all subheadings in all categories of the developer docs. Clicking on the link icon normally will just scroll that section to the top of your screen.
